product.title: Cars 2 | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Race off on another adventure with everyone’s favorite vehicles from the Disney·Pixar movie Cars 2. Lightning McQueen is no longer a rookie—in fact he’s one of the top race cars in the world. When he gets the chance to compete in an international race, he brings along his best friend, a tow truck named Mater. But the story takes a sharp turn when Mater is mistaken for a spy! Kids are sure to enjoy this exciting, action-packed adventure, while parents will appreciate the underlying lessons about friendship, loyalty, and being yourself.

Tie-in Activity: Send your child on a secret mission! Hide age-appropriate toys (cars would be perfect) throughout the house, then send your child to find the hidden objects.
